<!-- Bet Hedger App - Copilot Instructions -->

## Project Overview
This is a React Native Expo mobile app for calculating bet hedging amounts.

## Tech Stack
- React Native with Expo SDK 52
- JavaScript/JSX
- Expo CLI for development

## Running the App
- `npm start` - Start Expo development server
- Press `w` to open in web browser (for Windows testing)
- Press `i` for iOS simulator
- Press `a` for Android emulator

## Key Features
- Bet hedge calculator with American odds
- Free bet/bonus money toggle for accurate hedging
- Dark theme UI optimized for mobile

## Code Structure
- `App.js` - Main application with calculator logic and UI
- `app.json` - Expo configuration
- `assets/` - App icons (SVG placeholders)
